name: api_math_Bounds
description: Represents an axis aligned bounding box.

properties.name: center
properties.description: The center of the bounding box.

properties.name: extents
properties.description: The extents of the Bounding Box. This is always half of the size of the Bounds.

properties.name: max
properties.description: The maximal point of the box. This is always equal to center+extents.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The minimal point of the box. This is always equal to center-extents.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The total size of the box. This is always twice as large as the extents.
